p.k: Ben accidentally creates a giant sink hole and frees King Koil and his Kimodo Dragon from below. / After a series of reoccurring nightmares affect his sleep, Ben refuses to open up to Max and Gwen about what's bothering him... / Ben, Gwen, and Max go on a hike in search of a legendary Forgeti, a yeti that makes people forget they ever saw it. / Ben has to clean the Rust Bucket, but when he is tricked into letting the vile Fly Guys steal it, he must chase them down before they create an unstoppable maggot monster. / While tailgating at a State U. homecoming football game, Ben teams up with Grandpa Maxâ€™s old college buddies to keep the crazy clown Zombozo from robbing the stadium.
